p:
The percentage ABTS inhibitory effect of the EO of T. minuta flower on ABTS radical are shown in Fig. 3. At 0.5 mg/mL concentration of the EO of T. minuta, the inhibition was 70% while vitamin C (positive control) was 80%.Fig. 3
Antioxidant effect of essential oil of T. minuta flower and vitamin C on ABTS radical
